en.title: FusionExcel Achievers Recognition Dinner, Jakarta 02nd May 2009 (1)
en.content:
FE's recent Achievers Recognition Dinner held at Millennium Hotel Jakarta on 02nd May 2009 was a great success attended by many quality FE Leaders, Members and invited guests. FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting attended with FE's Founder Director KS Lee together with Presidential Directors KC Phoon, Sam Ho, Willy Toh and Stanley Liew. It was great to see new groups of Indonesian leaders attending the event.

Highlights Include:

- Entertainment by well known Indonesian TV Personality and Singer Sandro Tobing.

- Welcome Speech by FE's Indonesian Country Licensee Patrick Widjaja.

- Opening Speech by FE's Founder Director KS Lee.

- Speech by FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting.

- Product Demo by PD KC Phoon, who as usual did a great job. All the first timers were very impressed by
  the power of FE's Quantum Pendant!

- Sharing and Testimonial by FE's Indonesian Spokeswoman and Olympics Gold Medalist, Susy Susanti.

- Mock cheque presentation and donation from FE of RP 53,800,000 (RM 17,000) to Rotary International
  Indonesia's "Gift Of Life" Project. The donation is to pay for a heart operation for a child to enable it to
  live a normal life. Rotary International Indonesia was represented by it's former District Governor Natalie
  Soebagjo. Witnessing the donation was heart surgeon Dr Jusuf Rachmat from Hospital Dr Cipto
  Mangunkusuma who will be performing the operation on the child. Dr Jusuf is one of a small handful of
  heart surgeons who specializes in heart surgery for young children and babies.

- Installation of new Indonesian Director.

- Sharing and Testimonials by FE Presidential Directors Sam Ho and Stanley Liew.

- Closing Speech by PD KC Phoon.

- Lucky Draws.

A BIG THANK YOU to FE's Indonesian Country Licensee Patrick Widjaja and his team, Joe Prabah, Anowar JM and Irene Mongkar for organizing the successful event. A BIG THANK YOU also to MC Sandro Tobing and to all FE Leaders for supporting the event. AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!!! 



< Click here for more photos >

meta.description: FE's recent Achievers Recognition Dinner held at Millenium Hotel Jakarta on 2nd May 2009 was a great success attended by many quality FE Leaders, Members and invited guests. FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting attended with FE's Founder Director KS Lee together with Presidential Directors KC Phoon, Sam Ho, Willy Toh and Stanley Liew. It was great to see new groups of Indonesian leaders attending the event.
meta.author: klhunter
